titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Navy, the Secretary of the Air Force, and the Secretary of the Army to carry out a pilot program on producing parts through reverse engineering, and for other purposes.

A bill to require the Secretary of the Navy, the Secretary of the Air Force, and the Secretary of the Army to carry out a pilot program on producing parts through reverse engineering, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Departments of the Navy, Air Force, and Army to jointly complete a pilot program to assess the feasibility and advisability of producing parts through reverse engineering. The departments must submit interim and final reports to Congress on the pilot program.
